amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following new title: \ TITLE V--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS \ SEC. 501. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to adversely affect the physical integrity of Indian Sacred Sites on Federal lands (as such terms are defined in Executive Order 13007, dated May 24, 1996).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in the bill to adversely affect the physical integrity of Indian Sacred Sites on certain Federal lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 215 (Roll no. 252).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Rahall.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 215 (Roll no. 252).
